name: NETGEAR
0:
”Alexa, ask NETGEAR to enable guest network”
”Alexa, ask NETGEAR to reboot my router”
”Alexa, ask NETGEAR what are my WiFi settings”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: netgear
des:
With the NETGEAR skill and Alexa, you can interact with your NETGEAR routers and Orbi WiFi Systems using voice commands.
To enable the NETGEAR skill:
1. Enable remote management on your router. 
If you have an Orbi WiFi system, use the Orbi app to enable remote management. For all other routers, use the Nighthawk app. 
2. Enable the NETGEAR skill in the Alexa app.
3. When the Alexa app prompts you to sign in, use the same NETGEAR account credentials that you previously used in the Nighthawk or Orbi app when you enabled remote management on your router or Orbi WiFi system. 
The following are example commands that you can ask:
- Alexa, ask NETGEAR to enable guest network.
- Alexa, ask NETGEAR what are my WiFi settings.
- Alexa, ask NETGEAR what's my Internet speed.
- Alexa, ask NETGEAR what's my Internet usage.
- Alexa, ask NETGEAR how much Internet did I use yesterday.
 
For more information about supported products, visit https://www.netgear.com/Alexa.
 
NOTE: For the best experience, make sure to update your NETGEAR device to the latest firmware. For more information, visit support.netgear.com.
